Topic.Title: Can I change the name of my game?

Posts.EditableText: If I change the name on the edit listing portion, will it change the name of my game? I already piblished my game publicly. Pokemon Type Harley Johto and Sinnoh is too long.
Posts.HTML: If I change the name on the edit listing portion, will it change the name of my game? I already piblished my game publicly. Pokemon Type Harley Johto and Sinnoh is too long.

Posts.EditableText:
If no one has a better idea, I suggest you create a test game, and publish that. Then see what happens when you change the name.

Then tell us what you found!
Posts.HTML:
If no one has a better idea, I suggest you create a test game, and publish that. Then see what happens when you change the name.

Then tell us what you found!

Posts.EditableText: Thank you! I got it to work!
Posts.HTML: Thank you! I got it to work!
